title: GDA expresses solidarity with armed forces - DAWN.COM
content:
The Grant Democratic Alliance (GDA) held a rally to express solidarity with the armed forces against the Indian aggression.

A large number of participants at the Tahffuz-e-Pakistan rally, belonging to the GDA and other political and religious parties, reached the Karachi Press Club from different parts of the city.

They raised strong slogans in favour of the Pakistani army and against Indian aggression by the Modi government.

Addressing the rally, Jamiat Ulema Islam (JUI) leader Noorul Haq said the entire nation stood by the Pakistani army. He said India attacking Pakistan in the dark of night is condemnable, adding that the nation is proud of its brave army.
